column5: Yeah I know I got 36 days left until we go to Lac Seul.I got a room at the Super 8 in Kenora reserved,ordered my leeches from the 4 Seasons in Ear Falls,put new line on all the reels,bought two new bottom bouncer rods and bought 2 new rods for jigging. I showed my wife the selection of leaders,spinners,plain hook and hook and bead leaders.She said I hadn't tied enough leaders.So I have Blues Traveler cranked up and I've been tieing leaders all day.Bill
Lol, your wife is smart and knows how to get you out of her hair!
adempseyShe got called in to work a double shift today.
Its not keeping him out of her hair, its keeping him busy so he doesn't buy any more rods/reels! Not that I am speaking from experience or anything
